data.name: Muse-Adult Pack
data.detailed_description:
This is a DLC for adults. All virtual characters in the game contents for 18 years old and above.
The game contains adult content and sexual scene.

How To Use：
1. When you open the date system, you can see the adult animation.
2. When you take photos in the game, you can have more naked posture.
3. When you fight in a pub, you activate more animations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512M
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: There are adult animations in the date system.
